article: Last Sunday turned out to be more exciting than I had expected. We were at our grandparents' house for a visit as _ . My cousin and I had made an appointment to go in-line skating in the nearby park. He could do some neat stunts and had promised to show me _ . We managed to persuade our parents to _ us go in-line skating on our own. _ it soon started to rain and we had to seek shelter on the empty deck (place) of a block of flats. It really dampened my _ . Suddenly, we heard a _ and saw a man dashing out of a lift. Just as he ran _ us, we saw an old woman coming out of the same lift and crying, "Thief! Thief!" My cousin immediately went after the thief in his _ . To be honest, I was extremely _ at the beginning .Then I heard a honk. It was my uncle and aunt. I jumped into their car and told them about the robbery. We _ off in the thief's direction while my aunt stayed with the old woman. Soon, we _ up with my cousin. He was still in hot pursuit of the thief. Seeing his _ , my uncle sped up and turned suddenly to the right to _ just in front of the thief. The man was _ and fell to the ground. My uncle got out of the car and _ the man down with his body. By this time, we could hear the siren of a police car approaching, _ , my aunt had phoned the police and told them the _ which we were heading, so they were able to locate us . We handed the thief over to the police officers who took down our names and _ . They informed us that we would be called up to give our _ . After that, we returned to the empty deck in our uncle's car to _ my aunt up . When we reached there, the old woman had already left to give a report to the police. Our family members were all proud of us for our courageous deed.
